title: Corpse Decay
desc:
Post 1856
- The top 3 cards on the discard pile (excluding this one) are **Banished**.
- For every card Banished, the Clocktower moves forward **1** hour.
- If any of the Banished cards have the colors <:clocks:1171222463200379021>, <:bones:1118750770133737565>, or <:grave:1119394182310670366>, the Clocktower moves forward an additional hour.
